DWFiv3SawMillLogRearEntry.displayName: DWFiv3's Saw Mill R1/R2/R3 Rear Entry
DWFiv3SawMillLogRearEntry.name: DWFiv3SawMillLogRearEntry
DWFiv3SawMillLogRearEntry.description: An optional entry to the saw mill for the easy unloading of logs directly into R1/R2/R3 Tracks.

DWFiv3SawMillInterchangeInterconnection.name: DWFiv3SawMillInterchangeInterconnection
DWFiv3SawMillInterchangeInterconnection.description: A track interconnection linking DWFiv3's Saw Mill to the main interchange. To use other Whittier yard mods, DO NOT enable this.

DWFiv3SawMillLogRearEntrySection.displayName: Whittier Saw Mill R1/R2/R3 Rear Entry
DWFiv3SawMillLogRearEntrySection.description: An optional entry to DWFiv3's Saw Mill for the easy unloading of logs directly into R1/R2/R3 Tracks.

DWFiv3SawMillInterchangeSection.description: A track interconnection linking DWFiv3's Saw Mill to the main interchange. To use other Whittier yard mods, DO NOT enable this.
